trans-unit.source: Provides static methods to aid with the implementation of a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatter"></xref> for serialization.
trans-unit.target: 提供静态方法，以协助实现<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatter"></xref>序列化。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref:System.Type> can be deserialized with the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.TypeFilterLevel"></xref> property set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_Low" name="Low" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否指定<xref:System.Type>可以反序列化与<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.TypeFilterLevel"></xref>属性设置为<xref uid="langword_csharp_Low" name="Low" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> to check for the ability to deserialize.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>检查反序列化的功能。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.TypeFilterLevel"></xref> property value.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.TypeFilterLevel"> </xref>属性值。

trans-unit.source: The t parameter is an advanced type and cannot be deserialized when the property is set to .
trans-unit.target: t 参数是一个高级的类型，不能为反序列化时属性设置为 。

trans-unit.source: Extracts the data from the specified object and returns it as an array of objects.
trans-unit.target: 从指定对象中提取数据并将其作为对象的数组返回。

trans-unit.source: For each supplied member of the `members` array the GetObjectData method extracts the value associated with the `obj` object, and returns it.
trans-unit.target: 每个提供成员`members`数组 GetObjectData 方法提取与关联的值`obj`对象，并将其返回。

trans-unit.source: The length of the returned array is the same as the length of the `members` array.
trans-unit.target: 返回数组的长度是相同的长度`members`数组。

trans-unit.source: The object to write to the formatter.
trans-unit.target: 要写入的格式化程序的对象。

trans-unit.source: The members to extract from the object.
trans-unit.target: 要从对象中提取的成员。

trans-unit.source: An array of that contains data stored in members and associated with obj.
trans-unit.target: 数组包含数据存储在 members 和与关联 obj 。

trans-unit.source: The obj or members parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The obj or members parameter is .

trans-unit.source: An element of members is .
trans-unit.target: An element of members is .

trans-unit.source: An element of members does not represent a field.
trans-unit.target: 一个元素 members 不表示字段。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the specified object type.
trans-unit.target: 创建指定的对象类型的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Because the new instance of the object is initialized to zero and no constructors are run, the object might not represent a state that is regarded as valid by that object.
trans-unit.target: 因为对象的新实例初始化为零，并在运行任何构造函数，该对象可能不是由该对象被认为是有效的状态。

trans-unit.source: GetSafeUninitializedObject should only be used for deserialization when the user intends to immediately populate all fields.
trans-unit.target: GetSafeUninitializedObject 应仅用于反序列化时用户想要立即填充所有字段。

trans-unit.source: It does not create an uninitialized string, since creating an empty instance of an immutable type serves no purpose.
trans-unit.target: 它不创建未初始化的字符串，因为创建不可变类型的空实例没有任何用途。

trans-unit.source: GetSafeUninitializedObject converts all class level [Link Demands](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) to [Demands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e5283e28-2366-4519-b27d-ef5c1ddc1f48) to ensure that all direct and indirect callers have the permissions that the demand specifies.
trans-unit.target: GetSafeUninitializedObject 将转换的所有类级别[链接需求](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)到[需求](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e5283e28-2366-4519-b27d-ef5c1ddc1f48)以确保所有直接和间接调用方具有要求指定的权限。

trans-unit.source: Use GetSafeUninitializedObject to increase the level of security when deserializing from a partially trusted source.
trans-unit.target: 使用 GetSafeUninitializedObject 从部分受信任的源反序列化时增加的安全级别。

trans-unit.source: For better performance in full trust scenarios, use <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.FormatterServices.GetUninitializedObject%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 对于在完全信任方案中更好的性能，使用<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.FormatterServices.GetUninitializedObject%2A>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.FormatterServices.GetUninitializedObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: The type of object to create.
trans-unit.target: 要创建的对象类型。

trans-unit.source: A zeroed object of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 指定类型的零的对象。

trans-unit.source: The type parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The type parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The type parameter is not a valid common language runtime type.
trans-unit.target: type 参数不是有效的公共语言运行时类型。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 调用方没有所要求的权限。

trans-unit.source: Gets all the serializable members for a class of the specified <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定<xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type>类可序列化的所有成员

trans-unit.source: Generally, the serializable members of a class are the non-transient, non-static members such as fields and properties.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，类的可序列化的成员是如字段和属性的非瞬态、 非静态成员。

trans-unit.source: To be included, properties must have both a getter and a setter.
trans-unit.target: 要包含，属性必须具有 getter 和 setter。

trans-unit.source: A class that implements the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> interface or has a serialization surrogate does not have to serialize all these members, or can serialize additional members.
trans-unit.target: 一个类以实现<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>接口或具有序列化代理项没有序列化所有这些成员，或者可以将其他成员序列化为。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>

trans-unit.source: The type being serialized.
trans-unit.target: 正在序列化的类型。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo> of the non-transient, non-static members.
trans-unit.target: 类型的数组<xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>非暂时性、 非静态成员。</xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>

trans-unit.source: The type parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The type parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 调用方没有所要求的权限。

trans-unit.source: Gets all the serializable members for a class of the specified <xref:System.Type> and in the provided <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定的<xref:System.Type>和中提供的<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext></xref:System.Type>类可序列化的所有成员

trans-unit.source: Generally, the serializable members of a class are the non-transient, non-static members such as fields and properties.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，类的可序列化的成员是如字段和属性的非瞬态、 非静态成员。

trans-unit.source: To be included, properties must have both a getter and a setter.
trans-unit.target: 要包含，属性必须具有 getter 和 setter。

trans-unit.source: A class that implements <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> or has a serialization surrogate does not have to serialize all these members, or can serialize additional members.
trans-unit.target: 一个类以实现<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>或具有序列化代理项没有序列化所有这些成员，或者可以将其他成员序列化为。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>

trans-unit.source: Currently, you do not need to do anything different unless `context` has the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContextStates> value <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContextStates> set.
trans-unit.target: 目前，不需要执行任何不同的操作，除非`context`具有<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContextStates>值<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContextStates>设置。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContextStates> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContextStates>

trans-unit.source: The type being serialized or cloned.
trans-unit.target: 正在序列化或克隆类型。

trans-unit.source: The context where the serialization occurs.
trans-unit.target: 发生序列化上下文。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo> of the non-transient, non-static members.
trans-unit.target: 类型的数组<xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>非暂时性、 非静态成员。</xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>

trans-unit.source: The type parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The type parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 调用方没有所要求的权限。

trans-unit.source: Returns a serialization surrogate for the specified <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializationSurrogate"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定的序列化代理项<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializationSurrogate"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified surrogate.
trans-unit.target: 指定代理项。

trans-unit.source: An for the specified innerSurrogate.
trans-unit.target: An for the specified innerSurrogate.

trans-unit.source: Looks up the <xref:System.Type> of the specified object in the provided <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>.
trans-unit.target: 查找<xref:System.Type>指定的对象中提供的<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>。</xref:System.Reflection.Assembly> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The assembly where you want to look up the object.
trans-unit.target: 你想要查找对象的程序集。

trans-unit.source: The name of the object.
trans-unit.target: 对象的名称。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the named object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>的已命名的对象。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The assem parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The assem parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 调用方没有所要求的权限。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the specified object type.
trans-unit.target: 创建指定的对象类型的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Because the new instance of the object is initialized to zero and no constructors are run, the object might not represent a state that is regarded as valid by that object.
trans-unit.target: 因为对象的新实例初始化为零，并在运行任何构造函数，该对象可能不是由该对象被认为是有效的状态。

trans-unit.source: The current method should only be used for deserialization when the user intends to immediately populate all fields.
trans-unit.target: 当前方法应仅用于反序列化时用户想要立即填充所有字段。

trans-unit.source: It does not create an uninitialized string, since creating an empty instance of an immutable type serves no purpose.
trans-unit.target: 它不创建未初始化的字符串，因为创建不可变类型的空实例没有任何用途。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You cannot use the GetUninitializedObject method to create instances of types that derive from the <xref:System.ContextBoundObject> class.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 不能使用 GetUninitializedObject 方法来创建实例的类型的派生<xref:System.ContextBoundObject>类。</xref:System.ContextBoundObject>

trans-unit.source: The type of object to create.
trans-unit.target: 要创建的对象类型。

trans-unit.source: A zeroed object of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 指定类型的零的对象。

trans-unit.source: The type parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The type parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 调用方没有所要求的权限。

trans-unit.source: Populates the specified object with values for each field drawn from the data array of objects.
trans-unit.target: 将填充每个字段值取自对象的数据数组的指定的对象。

trans-unit.source: If an element in `data` is `null`, PopulateObjectMembers does not write anything to that field.
trans-unit.target: 如果中的某个元素`data`是`null`，PopulateObjectMembers 给该字段都不写入任何内容。

trans-unit.source: The object to populate.
trans-unit.target: 要填充的对象。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo> that describes which fields and properties to populate.
trans-unit.target: 数组<xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>描述的字段和属性，以填充。</xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Object> that specifies the values for each field and property to populate.
trans-unit.target: 数组<xref:System.Object>，它指定每个字段和属性来填充的值。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The newly populated object.
trans-unit.target: 新填充的对象。

trans-unit.target: The obj, members, or data parameter is .

trans-unit.target: An element of members is .

trans-unit.target: 长度 members 与的长度不匹配 data 。

trans-unit.source: An element of members is not an instance of .
trans-unit.target: 一个元素 members 不.是实例

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 调用方没有所要求的权限。
